attributes.action: have Derek Conway taken to court.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Derek Conway has comitted fraud and theft and has cost the taxpayer £1,535,716.70 in dubious payments to family members. In any other profession an indiviudal giving money to family members or friends under the same conditions would end up in prison. He shouldn't be exempt from the rule of law.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/DerekConwayMP/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
